docs.description:
Villa Vesna, situated in Mlini near Dubrovnik, is a well-appointed retreat featuring 3 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, making it ideal for up to 6 guests. The villa offers a comfortable living area with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, along with a fully equipped kitchen for your convenience. Located just 400 meters from the nearest beach, it provides easy access to the Adriatic coast.
The villa's outdoor area includes an infinity swimming pool with beautiful sea views, an outdoor dining table, a bar, and a sunning area, perfect for outdoor relaxation. Guests can also enjoy a small fitness studio on the property. Villa Vesna offers two free parking spaces and includes amenities such as a baby cot and high chair for families. Please note that pets are not allowed, ensuring a peaceful and clean environment for all guests.

docs.name: Villa Vesna

docs.description: Modern new villa on the island of Ciovo, in Torgir with a marvellous view of the sea. Ideal for 8 people as it has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. It is 350m^2 of living space with private pool, sauna, garden and spacious parking. It is air-conditioned and only 300m away from the nearest beach Mavarstica. Vela Draga Beach is 800 metres from Villa Medusa, while Bocici Beach is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Split Airport, 7 km from Villa Medusa.

docs.description:
Boutique style villa in center of Split, new renovated in 2023 with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room, working room, terace with dining table, lounge corner, some mediterrian flowers and plants and an amazing view to the diocletian palace and the sea with islands. A grill with some staff and a own parking place for up to 2 cars. Very quiet area with big privacy.
The living room has a small bar with additional fridge and wine bar. Fully equipped kitchen, aircondition in all rooms, wifi, smart TV and games for children.
This villa is ideal for families or groups with children.

docs.name: Boutique Villa Anna Varos
Villa Daisy
docs.description:
Located just few minutes driving from famous Dubrovnik, beautiful Villa Daisy enjoys an elevated position overlooking a tranquil bay and nearby islands, with a spectacular view of the surroundings. This villa is home away from home. Villa Daisy provides its guests an oasis of peace and perfect comfort in idyllic setting of the authentic Mediterranean area.
Villa Daisy is newly built and modern 2 bedroom villa which provides you the opportunity to spend your holidays away from the city crowd yet still close enough to visit for dinner or lunch. Close to the paradise – that is the best description of the villa.
This exquisitely designed villa is arranged over three floors and since villa is situated on a hillside, from each room and terrace there are great views of Mediterranean Sea, its surrounding islands and lavish Dalmatian countryside.On the second floor there is entrance hall which is connected with stairs to first floor where is magnificent fully equipped kitchen, family room and nice and modern living area where you can enter to balcony with seating area which make the perfect spot for al fresco dining while enjoying one of the finest sunsets on the planet. On this floor there is also bedroom with double bed and terrace and bathroom with shower. On the ground floor there is confortable bedroom with ensuite bathroom with shower. From bedroom you are approaching terrace with outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds around the pool for those who like to soak up the sun’s rays during the day.

locationItems.label: 1000 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

docs.name: Bol Beach House
docs.description:
Villa Bol Summer House is located on the intriguing island of Brac – Bol Town. It is not possible to avoid the symbol of the island beach Zlatni rat, certainly the most beautiful beach on the Adriatic Sea, whose cape is turning one moment to one side and the other moment to the other side playing a strange game with the wind and the waves. The beach, framed with deep pine groves for shade, is a favorite destination for surfers and sailors from various parts of Europe and the world because the sea channel between the islands of Brac and Hvar creates ideal winds for windsurfing. However, it is not only a place of exceptional beauty, but also full of traditions and secrets that will make your vacation complete. We invite you to explore this unique island that offers everything one needs for an unforgettable holiday in an unspoiled natural environment.
Villa Bol Summer House is set on property 2200m² big, amongst the vineyards, pine trees and just moments away from the beach. It offers a peaceful retreat away from the crowds, with amazing views of the Adriatic and Hvar Island. Villa Bol Summer House is the perfect place for a family with bigger children or small group of friends to enjoy a holiday. Sleeping 4 adults comfortably in two spacious and airy bedrooms and 2 children in third bedroom situated on gallery at the attic of main part where is also a living area with fully equipped kitchen, leading to a covered south facing terrace, an ideal place to watch the world go by on the sea below.
Breath-taking pool area awaits you when you walk from the bedrooms. The outdoor pool (20m²) and outdoor hot tub with a gorgeous view will give you the feeling that heaven is a place on earth. The entire pool area is equipped with an deck chairs, sun umbrellas and sitting furniture and outdoor showers. Enjoying memorable moments and the natural beauty of this wonderful place will allow you to relax and escape from the pressures of everyday life.Should you wish to drag yourself away from the pool, then it’s a short stroll to the beach or if you would like to relax a little bit more – there is a Finnish sauna, steam room and a gym – which allows you and your friends and family to relax in different way.

locationItems.label: 500 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

docs.name: Villa La Cream
docs.description:
Brac has always been known as the choice for families who seek the better things in life. The largest and most accessible of the dalmatian islands its tree lined shores and picturesque villages have stood relatively untouched for hundreds of years. The islands 150 square miles contain an attractive combination of stunning scenery, dramatic mountains, idyllic bays and 14 beautiful villages. Emerald-blue waters and secluded pebble shores sit effortlessly beside historic buildings and natural wonders.Blessed with crystal-clear waters, the area offers the perfect conditions for life on the sea: sailing, fishing, some of the best scuba diving in the Mediterranean and just about every water sport under the sun. Beyond this the choice is yours: from ancient historical sites, picturesque harbours, nature trails to explore, as well as a multitude of beach front bars and restaurants to enjoy.
Your busy lifestyle means every moment of your leisure time is precious, so in Villa La Cream the impressive internal specification includes gym, home office, media room, sauna, steam room, wine celler and boat mooring. Villa La Cream has been designed to provide all the facilities you need to relax and escape from the pressures of everyday life.
Villa La Cream is a luxurious waterfront property bordering a crystal blue bay on the south side of Brac Island. The villa is spread over three floors and consists of 4 en suite bedrooms. The design combines modern lines with traditional materials to fit its surrounding environment. The layout makes the most of the majestic views by combining open plan living with floor to ceiling foldable windows. Externally the villa benefits from a contemporary infinity edged swimming pool overlooking a floating dock and moorings below. The sheltered location makes it perfect for mooring a boat during summer months and exploring
nearby attractions by water.

locationItems.label: 3000 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

docs.name: Villa Green Frame
docs.description:
Green Frame might look just like an ordinary holiday villa, but when you start digging deeper it is clear that you’ve run into something special!

Villa “Green Frame” is located only 15 km from the largest Istrian city of Pula, 10 km from Pula Airport, 10 km from Brijuni archipelago and the seaside, with less than half an hour drive to all popular locations within the Istrian peninsula. The property is located in a secluded but quite popular location for the accommodation of wealthy guests seeking intimacy and a getaway from neighbors, disturbances or crowd. The total area of the property is 4200 m2 and the landscaped part of the property is approximately 2500 m2. The property is largely fenced in a stone wall that surrounds the beauty of the Istrian autochthonous estate, giving it discretion and security.
Enjoy a playful synergy of Mediterranean stone, hard wood and sharp modern furniture lines – all combined with a profound sense of style and aesthetics. The walls of the villa are packed with art paintings – vivid colors are warming up every inch of the cozy interior full of natural daylight. Spacious enough to comfortably host up to 10+2 people, this beauty offers one of the best experiences one can find in the south Istrian hinterland. Green Frame Villa even has a sweet spot for the real headonists and wine lovers – a beautifully furnished and well equipped wine cellar, right next to the open terrace with a dining area and a pool view. For spring, autmn and winter wellness experience here are indoor hot tub and finish sauna sa well as sport appliances and equipment.

locationItems.label: 2000 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

docs.name: Villa Nena
docs.description:
Charming furnished stone villa in 1st sea line. Featuring large garden with lush of trees providing shade andprivacy. It offers high comfort and isn’t far from the historic town of Trogir, reachable by a slow pace stroll, bycar or public taxi boat stopping only a 100 meters away from the property.
The large gravel beach features many amenities of which bars, playgrounds and restaurants located rightoutside the house. A gently sloping beach looks inviting for families with children for having the perfect day outside.
Children cot is delivered upon request and is free of charge.
Pets are not allowed at this property.
Security deposit – 200€ paid and returned on spot if no damage has occured.
Villa surface: 200 m2, 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms
Detached villa with a large garden, air conditioning and Internet WiFi, heating included in the price. Bed linen is delivered with a weekly change, towels (1 large, 1 small / per person and week). Washing machine in the living unit, Sat-TV and much more.Balcony with sea view, standard furniture plus parasols.
Area of balcony: 24sqm
Private terrace with sea view.
Area of the terrace: 15sqm
Large private garden, barbecue, closed parking for up to 3 cars. In price included are use of the internet Wifi connection, automatic AC with individual control use, final cleaning, bed linen and towels with a weekly change as like gas, water and electricity consumption.
